name: Heavens Aligned
description:
A Rube Goldburg Machine story telling experience featuring Leona and Diana from League of Legends.  A secret reunion between the two stars, love, hatred, identity and culture...... Where does their future lie?

instructions:

First, Download image file down below to read a short 2 page prologue (*read as a Japanese manga,  right to left)

Then, Run game and Press Space to start the experience

Enjoy! :)

credit: BGM 寻梦旅人 by 桑葚上的猴子

design goal:

 explore relationship between conversation and physics.

Having a conversations are like  2 balls pushing each other. There is the driven force  from the previous person that pushes you and there are physical properties like mass and friction that determines at what rate will your dialogue go and how far you will go.
